alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Chesterfield; Henrico; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:24PM EDT until April 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD...NORTHWESTERN CHARLES CITY...WESTERN NEW KENT AND SOUTHEASTERN HENRICO COUNTIES... At 924 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bensley, or 7 miles northeast of Chester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Bottoms Bridge around 935 PM EDT. Roxbury around 940 PM EDT. Adkins Store around 945 PM EDT. Charles City and Providence Forge around 950 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Wrights Corner, Richmond Heights, Wayside, Mountcastle, Orapax Farms, Elko, Sandston, Glendale, Richmond International and Quinton. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Chesterfield; Henrico; New Kent
